text: The Darkest Sword is a 1970 Hong Kong action drama movie directed by Lung Chien and starring Ching-Ching Chang and Pin Chiang.Hei jian gui jing tian == Plot == Tun-Shan is sad because he unintentionally killed an enemy and destroys his sword. Meanwhile, Su-Chen, convinces him to start fighting again. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 action movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lung Chien
title: The Darkest Sword
